title.narrative: Implementation of Market System Development - RDEL

description.narrative: This activity (Implementation of Market System Development - RDEL) is a component of Northern Uganda: Transforming the Economy through Climate Smart Agribusiness (NU-TEC) reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £18,834,189. This component benefits Uganda, and works in the following sector(s): Agricultural development, Rural development. , with the following implementing partners: International Procurement Agency, Palladium International Ltd (UK). The start date is 08-09-2014 and the end date is 31-03-2022.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

description.narrative: Agriculture - Economic Affairs - Agriculture - policy, planning and administration
